T = int(raw_input())

for z in xrange(T):
    s = raw_input().strip()

    cache = [ [0 for j in xrange(55)] for i in xrange(55) ]

    N = len(s)
    for l in xrange(N,0,-1):
        for i in xrange(N-l+1):
            j = i+l
            
            if i == 0 or j == N:
                cache[i][j] = 0
            else:
                cache[i][j] = cache[i-1][j] + cache[i][j+1] - cache[i-1][j+1]
                if s[i-1] == s[j]:
                    cache[i][j] += cache[i-1][j+1] + 1

    tot = 0
    for i in xrange(N):
        for j in xrange(i+1,N+1):
            if s[i] == s[j-1]:
                tot += cache[i][j] + 1

    print tot
